Package app

Class Photo

  • java.lang.Object
    • app.Photo
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    public class Photo
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    This is the Photo class that stores the information of a photo including its caption, date/time, tags, and the actual image itself
    Since:
    2022-03-29
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Roma Patel(rkp86), Omer Syed Farooq (ofs9)
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
